definition: to group students into classes/to divide people (staff members etc) into groups
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
see 常態分班|常态分班[chang2 tai4 fen1 ban1]

sentences.english: Children will be grouped according to their ages.
sentences.chinese: 本園根據兒童年齡編班。

sentences.english: At the second year's examination, he was not classed at all.
sentences.chinese: 他在第二年的考試中落選了，不能被編班。

sentences.english: The school fee won't be refunded after enrollment.
sentences.chinese: 學生一旦編班入學，學費將不可退。

sentences.english: The new grouping of classes means larger numbers in each class.
sentences.chinese: 這次重新編班，意味着每個班的人數增多了。
